author: Annie Martin
title: Elizabeth Hurley stuns in bikini photo at age 50
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 26 (UPI) -- Elizabeth Hurley impressed fans with a new bikini photo Sunday on Instagram.
The 50-year-old English actress showed off her enviable figure in a yellow two-piece from her Elizabeth Hurley beach line, writing, "Mellow in yellow #elizabethhurleybeach."
Hurley also posted a picture of herself with her son Damian, and captioned the snapshot, "With my baby." The actress shares the 13-year-old with American businessman Steve Bing .
"If you've got time to think about aging then you're not busy enough," the star told People in April. "Being busy and interested is the key to being attractive. Narcissistic bores who stare at themselves in the mirror for hours are the dullest people on earth."
Hurley came to fame as a model, and is best known for her work with Est√©e Lauder. She launched her beach line in 2005, and discussed her approach to aging for Healthy Living magazine's October 2014 issue.
"There's zero point in dreading anything inevitable and I never have," she asserted. "Much better to concentrate on what you can change. The kinder and nicer you are to yourself and those around you will make you glow from within -- no matter what birthday you hit."
"Everyone ages and the same physical things happen to everyone regardless of your bank balance," she added. "However, everyone has the option of staying in shape, staying healthy, staying positive and looking after their teeth, skin and hair."
